PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  TYPE 
 IDENT Ball
STRUCT 
LBRACE 
 IDENT x
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT y
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT vx
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT vy
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT gravity
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT radius
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT velocity
   F32 f32
  ASGN =
FLOATL 0.5
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT ball
 IDENT Ball
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
 IDENT ball
PERIOD 
 IDENT vx
  ASGN =
INTLIT 0
 SUBOP -
 IDENT velocity
SCOLON 
RBRACE 
SCOLON
